title: How to Join a Telegram Channel PC or Mac

steps.title: Open the Telegram web app in your internet browser.
steps.content: Open the Telegram web app in your internet browser. Type web.telegram.org into the address bar, and hit ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return on your keyboard. If you're not automatically logged in to Telegram, you will have to provide your phone number, and verify your account via SMS.

steps.title: Click the Search bar.
steps.content: Click the Search bar. The Search bar is located at the top of your chats list in the upper-left corner of your screen.

steps.title: Type @ into the Search bar.
steps.content: Type @ into the Search bar. All channel names start with an @ sign. If you skip this part, the channel you're looking for might get buried under other contacts and messages in your search results.

steps.title: Type the channel's name following the "@" sign.
steps.content: Type the channel's name following the "@" sign. Matching results will show up below the Search bar as you type. Consider adding the Telegram Channels Bot by searching @tchannelsbot . It will make channel suggestions, and help you explore new and interesting channels. You can also look up channels at online libraries such as reddit.com/r/TelegramChannels , and tlgrm.eu/channels .

steps.title: Click the channel you want to join.
steps.content: Click the channel you want to join. Find the channel you're looking for in the search results on the left-hand side of your screen, and open the conversation.

steps.title: Click + JOIN at the bottom of the conversation.
steps.content: Click + JOIN at the bottom of the conversation. This button is located at the bottom of the channel's chat conversation. It will add this channel to your chats list.
